DOC.brief_summary: Pain injection propofol common side effect . The present study design investigate effect esmolol pain propofol injection compare remifentanil placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Esmolol Pretreatment Pain During Injection Propofol
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , prospective trial , 120 patient schedule undergo elective surgery randomize receive normal saline ( n=30 ) , remifentanil 0.35 Î¼g/kg ( n=30 ) , esmolol 0.5 mg/kg ( n=30 ) , Esmolol 1mg/kg ( n=30 ) pretreatment . Thirty second pretreatment , 25 % total calculate dose propofol ( 2 mg/kg ) administrate dorsal hand vein . Ten second propofol give rate 0.5 ml/sec pain assess four-point scale ( 0=none , 1 = mild , 2= moderate , 3= severe ) .
DOC.criteria: patient age 1960 year , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I II , schedule elective surgery general anesthesia Patients cardiovascular , neurological psychiatric disorder problem , patient receive analgesic sedative medication within last 24 hour , pregnancy exclude
